show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Peter Phillips interviews Indigo Cantor campaign manager with The International Leonard Peltier Defense Committee,... <!--more--> regarding the recent passing of Peter Matthiessen author of the book “Spirit of Crazy Horse” and close friend to the Free Leonard Peltier movement.
His second guest is Legal Scholar and Retired Judge of the California State Bar Court Lise Pearlman.
She is the author of a book and pending movie regarding Black Panther party founder Huey P.
Newton titled,  ”The Sky’s the Limit: People V.
Newton: The Real Trial of the 20th Century.” (Mickey Huff will return next week)
